messages.title: Am Newid Go Iawn / For Real Change
messages.content: Mae’r Torïaid yn parhau i dorri yn Llymder, Anghydraddoldeb ac Anghyfiawnder. Dim ond gyda Llafur y gall gael Newid Go Iawn i bobl Brycheiniog a Sir Faesyfed.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Only Labour has a plan to address the urgent climate emergency. If we do nothing we are doomed.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Free Internet for the Whole UK
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Full fibre broadband coverage for all. The rollout would start with the under-served areas.
We will introduce new public banks to replace local banks being shut down.
Invest in public services, introduce a real living wage of £10 per hour, bring an end to austerity.
The Labour Government will give Wales the funding we need for its future.

issues.environment: Only Labour has a plan to address the urgent climate emergency. If we do nothing we are doomed.
issues.health: The NHS in Brecon and Radnorshire will be protected and properly funded.
issues.labourEmployment: Only Labour has a plan to create good jobs and fair wages for everyone, especially in deprived areas.

community.content: We will introduce new public banks to replace local banks being shut down.

leaflet.personalStatement: The Tories have caused years of austerity and inequality. Tom Davies is committed to fighting for the real change we need in Brecon and Radnorshire.

endorsements.endorsement: Tom and Labour will give young people the security and prosperity we deserve.
Only a Labour MP can be trusted to deliver the real change we need.

quotes.text: Mae’r ASau ôl-Torïaid a Ddemocratiaid Rhyddfrydol wedi ein siomi. Ond Llywodraeth Lafur yn unig gaiff graddio gwir newid i bobl Brycheiniog a Sir Faesyfed.
Successive Tory and Lib Dem MPs have let us down. Only a Labour MP in a Labour Government can deliver real change for the people of Brecon and Radnorshire.
